title: Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily in Maputo by Age Group
summary: The chart shows the Minutes of at the Average Time Spent On Social Media Daily street .
\\n The highest Minutes was 150 in the 45-54 Age followed by 75 % in the 25-34 Age , 125 % in 45-54 and finally 74 % in 55-64 .
gold: This chart shows the average time spent on social media each day by different age groups in Maputo . \\n We can see in the chart that the group that spends the most time on social media - nearly 150 minutes or 2.5 hours - is aged 45 - 54 . The second highest users are in the 15 - 24 group which spends about 2 hours on average on social media .
